description.raw:
I was peeking at some of the windows warnings to see if any of them would impact API/ABI, and I noticed a few instances where virtual functions don't have the same signatures (differences in the `const`ness of several arguments, [msbuild warning C4373](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/os_windows/job/gazebo-ci-default-windows7-amd64/437/warnings38Result/category.63475806/)). I've fixed 4 of those warnings here:

* http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64/1080/warnings38Result/fixed/

There is still a [warning in Palette.cc](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/os_windows/job/gazebo-ci-default-windows7-amd64/437/warnings38Result/category.63475806/package.1656517967/) that I didn't fix because it involves a qt class, and I was a little confused.

  • http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64/1080/warnings38Result/fixed/

There is still a warning in Palette.cc that I didn't fix because it involves a qt class, and I was a little confused.

title.raw: Match const parameters in virtual functions to fix windows warnings
